statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{2 \, x^{2} - 13 \, x - 1 , 4 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 5 , 4 \, x^{3} + 3 \, x^{2} - 6 , 2 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x - 2 , 3 \, x^{3} + 4 \, x^{2} - 6\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
